title: Orchestrate Cloud Native Workloads With Kro and Kubernetes
author: Janakiram MSV
description: Learn about the Kubernetes Resource Orchestrator here: We define a Resource Graph Definition for WordPress and deploy multiple instances by creating them as Kro applications.
cntitle: 使用 Kro 和 Kubernetes 编排云原生工作负载
cndescription: 在此了解 Kubernetes 资源编排器：我们为 WordPress 定义了一个资源图定义，并通过将其创建为 Kro 应用程序来部署多个实例。
